reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: NAZ: Celebration of Zambia?s Golden Jubilee with an exhibition and an electronic exhibition

description.narrative: Zambia?s Fiftieth Anniversary provides a timely opportunity to bring the long and successful history of cooperation between the Embassy of Finlna Lusaka and the national Archives of Zambia to an end with one final event: a long-lasting tribute to the mater ials knowledge and skills that have been generated over the decade. Besides the exhibition an e-exhibition will be created to go onto the website and can be freely accessed by anyone in Zambia or abroad.1. Exhibition at the National Archives of ZambiaThe e xhibition that will conclude the project to be housed at the exhibition gallery of the National Archives of Zambia and will be built around the multimedia aspects of the project. The exhibition will coincide with 50 years Independence of Zambia in October 2014. 2. Creation of e-exhibitionAn e-exhibition in an exhibition in electronic format. It can be downloaded or viewed on a computer PC Mac laptop PDA tablet smartphone or any other kind of reading device.
